violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: Error silenced by the at sign (@)
violation.message: Adding "@" before \get_headers($theURL) prevents warning and errors during this function execution from being displayed. If you need to do that, you should probably implement a better way to qualify and recover from errors, using Exceptions.

violation.title: Error silenced by the at sign (@)
violation.message: Adding "@" before \inet_pton($ip) prevents warning and errors during this function execution from being displayed. If you need to do that, you should probably implement a better way to qualify and recover from errors, using Exceptions.

violation.title: Error silenced by the at sign (@)
violation.message: Adding "@" before \inet_pton('::1') prevents warning and errors during this function execution from being displayed. If you need to do that, you should probably implement a better way to qualify and recover from errors, using Exceptions.

violation.title: Error silenced by the at sign (@)
violation.message: Adding "@" before \inet_pton($address) prevents warning and errors during this function execution from being displayed. If you need to do that, you should probably implement a better way to qualify and recover from errors, using Exceptions.

violation.title: Error silenced by the at sign (@)
violation.message: Adding "@" before \inet_pton($requestIp) prevents warning and errors during this function execution from being displayed. If you need to do that, you should probably implement a better way to qualify and recover from errors, using Exceptions.

violation.title: Booleans and null should be compared strictly
violation.message: With booleans and null, only strict comparison (with === operator) should be used to lower bug risks and to improve performances.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This key local variable is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This calendar argument is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Avoid using deprecated PHP functions
violation.message: each() has been deprecated in PHP 7.2 and will be removed from PHP in the next major version.

violation.context: /** * Check if a string is a valid IP v4 compatibility (ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff.192.168.0.15). * @param string $IP2Check IP to check * @return bool */ function isIPv4Compatibility($IP2Check): bool { return (strrpos($IP2Check, ":") > 0 && strrpos($IP2Check, ".") > 0 && isIPv4(substr($IP2Check, strpos($IP2Check, ".") + 1)) && isIPv6(substr($IP2Check, 0, strpos($IP2Check, ".")) . ':0:0:0:0')
